website_summaries.verdict: Solar-powered cleaner floats on top of your pool, clearing away debris without worry.
pros: Cleans dirt and debris from your pool
Does a decent job of getting to the debris before it sinks to the bottom of the pool
Solar charge is powerful enough to keep the device running through the night
cons: Sometimes the solar breeze will get stuck on other devices or objects in the pool

customer_reviews.title: I loved it for the first couple of months but then ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it for the first couple of months but then the front paddle wheel quit turning to pick up debris on the surface. You can hear the gears and motor running but the paddle wheel doesn’t turn. Having paid $600+ for something like this and have it quit working is frustrating! They shouldn’t be charging this much for something made in China that is just going to fail after a couple of months! I’m sure Solar-Breeze is making a huge profit off of people like us!!!
customer_reviews.author: RacerGirl03

customer_reviews.title: It lasted 3 months and has stoped working.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice idea and works. It just did not hold up its been 3 months and now the front paddle has stopped working. Not sure how long because it keeps cruising around. It may have been broke for 2 months. Either way I have left a message with the MFG. No answer so we will see. In my opinion the price should be around 150.00 I would not buy again at this cost.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Does not last very long!
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it worked really well. It would get stuck once in a while on overhangs and the pool sweep suction tube. But seemed to do the job. I had the first version that lasted about a year then the plastic gears degraded and stop turning. So I bought the new one and it only lasted 4 months before the front paddle and wheels stopped moving! It really isn’t hard to design something this simple. I might have to make one myself and sell it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine  De Sanctis

customer_reviews.title: spill leaves
customer_reviews.text: I have thousands of very small leaves each day in my pool, so this device should be the holy grail. However, due to a poor design of the tray about 50% of the collected leaves are dumped in another spot because the device bumps to the wall! Then these leaves go to the botten of the pool. So instead of less work I have more work because I have to to clean the bottom of the pool almost daily instead of 1-2x/week with the old cleaner that had a better leave collecting system. One of the options (I do now) is to clean the tray every day, but this hels only a little bit. The tray should be designed differently.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Berend

customer_reviews.title: but I'm in LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: So I've only had the product for 5 days and I normally don't write reviews, but I'm in LOVE!!!!!! I opted for the newest version based on previous complaints. It has been going non stop for 5 days, never dies! My pool is always full of leaves and other junk. I spend hours hand skimming, no more! I live in Arizona, so plenty of sun. Form fit and function are great! Does not seem to get stuck in a corner for very long with out backing out and starting again. The basket is easy to remove and reinstall. As of right now I'm a huge fan, if your situation is similar to mine you cannot live without this skimming monster!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Estep

customer_reviews.title: Wont last long.
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the others have stated, it worked wonderfully for a few months, but then simply broke down. Was actually able to exchange and get a free replacement, but then a couple months later the new one stopped working as well. After having 2 of these units each stop working within 2-3 few months, I am currently looking for a similar product but from a different company. Would love to recommend because when they arent broken down they work great. But longevity doesnt seem to be something you will get with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, but promising idea.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and time. Cons: Does NOT get pool surface clean. Pros: 1. If they improved the actual cleaning ability, it could be great. The solar part absolutely works and this tootles around your pool like gangbusters, sweeping everything aside...just not into its screen. So debris is moved around, but not into machine. 2. I was able to return it with no hassle, thank goodness. If this worked, it would be a good investment, so I hope they improve the design some day. Price seems high, also for as few mechanics involved.
customer_reviews.author: A. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Didn't pick up a thing
customer_reviews.text: I let this putter around my pool for three weeks and it ended up picking up about 10 leaves. Meanwhile, I have hundreds of leaves on the floor of my pool. Its simply not doing its job. In my fairly small 14x30 pool this machine cannot do the job. Gnats are also left behind for the pool filter to deal with. The only thing it picked up was beetles, but for $600+ I can pick out the one beetle per week that finds its way into my pool. It never failed to go, unlike many reviews I read. It looks like its a cool automatic pool cleaner. It just doesn't do a thing but make you feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: if you buy this, you must buy extended warranty! it's a excellent idea product and function well when it worked. , it spills dirt everywhere when you try to retrieve it from the pool. They need to design a catch to prevent that. In 1 year and half, it was out of services 4 times already, now they are shipping me a brand new one. I gave 5 stars because of their excellent customer service. There are a lot of improvement needed on this product. Hopefully they will come soon. I really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: rtingdds

customer_reviews.title: I should also mention that I am a pool builder and recommend this robot to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I’m changing my review from a 5 star to a 1 star. The reason is this product has a known issue with the front motor that will break. I have bought 2 of these in the past because one was always broke in need of repair. I also bought a few for customers since I’m a pool builder and those also broke. If your ok with spending this much money on a cleaner that won’t last a single pool season then this product is for you. I strongly recommend not buying this until and look for something else. I hope this helps. Brian S Craig
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable!
customer_reviews.text: I've had two units---both failed. The first failed after about a month and was replaced by the manufacturer. The second/replacement failed exactly the same way as the first. The front paddle-wheel that picks up debris locked-up on both units. The motor runs, but the wheel is jammed up inside and won't turn. I am seeking a refund from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney J. Forkner

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! NO PRODUCT SUPPORT!
customer_reviews.text: We loved our Solar Breeze NX2 for 65 days at which point it stoped working, which was exactly 5 days after the seller's return deadline. Even more disappointing, the manufacturer, Solar Pool Technologies has been completely non-responsive: Our calls are met with the same recorded message directing us to send our concerns by email.. We have sent several emails and receive the same auto-reponse that our email has been received and will be answered in turn. After spending over $500 for only 65 days of machine operation and ZERO product support we feel cheated!
customer_reviews.author: Soccer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: my husband has named our new "pet" Dory because she just keeps swimming, just keeps swimming.....Picks up everything from insects and leaves to small twigs; and, even more important, the cottonwood blossoms. No more having to empty both skimmers multiple times throughout the day. Love, love, love this! Update since we started using this: Spring peepers are no match for Dory, she just gobbles them right up! Thankfully, for the frogs, Dory is friendly and it is solely catch and release, unlike the skimmer which has no compassion.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sortwell

customer_reviews.title: First year already broken :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year on a friend recommendation, this year the on/off switch is sticking so it’s hard to turn on/off however I do love how it cleans the surface of the pool. I suggest to search online, I just found this exact same item for $209.00 ... I should have researched:( UPDATE: the website with the lower price is GONE, also the unit now has a ticking sound and one of the wheels skips when turning, I contact solar breeze, and was told to ship it to them for warranty repairs which will take 2 weeks, as other reviewers wrote for the price it should last longer and they should give a longer warranty.
customer_reviews.author: O. Hubara

customer_reviews.title: Never hand skim your pool again.
customer_reviews.text: I have 22 palm trees in my backyard and during the spring they bloom and the pool is covered with debris. I used to have to skim my pool manually several times per day. Now, with the Solar Breeze, the pool is always sparkling clean on the surface. I am beyond happy with this product. The only negative I see is that there should be an easily reachable handle on the top of the Solar Breeze. The device weighs 11 pounds dry, but when full can weigh as much as 15 lbs.. Pretty difficult to reach down into the pool (without stepping in) and picking the Breeze straight up and out in order to clean out the captured debris.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas White

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It works ...okay. It usually has a decent amount of stuff it’s collected, but it gets stuck in the steps frequently and makes a squeaking noise constantly after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Art Vandelay

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It was making first 4 months now gears grinding and it won’t spin company won’t replace the product the basket is bad design it comes off after many uses in pool debree come out and back into the pool as well. Solar panel fades away too leaving a matte finish top. They need to really dump some money into quality parts then it’s gone be good for now it’s junk
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Failure after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Writing a review to echo what other negative reviews have stated. Worked great for a few months then failed to push itself properly. You can hear a whining/grinding sound as if it the motor is trying, but simply cannot do it. I've contacted the manufacturer, I'll updated based on how they handle the situation. Even if replaced though, there is obviously concern for long term reliability. **Update** Manufacturer responded within 24 hours and offered to send a new unit free of charge. Still concerned with longevity, but so far they have honored their product against what appears to be a known defect.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Expect it to die within 18 months
customer_reviews.text: We have had ours for a less than 2 years, ir work great, but as time went on, it started breaking down. First the motor stopped reversing, then some of the wheels stopped spinning, and finally it died altogether. Basically, the sun and pool broke down the machine. In fact, the solar panel started deteriorating within the first 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I often buy gadgets to help with pool maintenance and am disappointed. They are time consuming or complicated or just ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised. My expectations were fairly low. I often buy gadgets to help with pool maintenance and am disappointed. They are time consuming or complicated or just don't work at all. This was the opposite. It works beautifully. My pool STAYS clean even during rainy weather. It was surprisingly lightweight, required no assembly; it's silent and manuevers itself around the pool. All I kept thinking was: 'where has this been all my life?' It's solar, so it costs nothing to run. I love it. I would recommend it to aanyone who has a pool.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sapp

customer_reviews.title: This thing is incredibly effective!
customer_reviews.text: I have a high end Dolphin cleaner that really keeps the pool bottom and sides sparkling but top water is where they fall short. This unit is incredibley quick and easy to deploy. Solar keeps it running all day and night. I live near pine trees that continue to drop long needles into the pool constantly. This unit cleans them up with no issue. My built in skimming buckets do “ok” but with this machine running in the pool it looks incredibly clean and inviting! Glad I took a chance on this.
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: It's great - while it works
customer_reviews.text: I really love this device, and I really wanted to leave a favorable review. However, it has severe reliability issues. I'm on my third NX2 in 15 months. The first two fell victim to a supplier part quality control issue which, according to Solar Breeze, has been addressed. The third, and current, unit didn't last a year before it failed. I have to say the company has been very responsive, but at this point I've lost faith in this unit's durability and have given up on Solar Breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! The trees around my house are constantly dropping leaves and blossoms into my pool. It was impossible to keep up with. But the Solar Skimmer does an excellent job going around picking up debris all day long. My pool has never been this clean in the 2 years I've owned the house. And now I only use electricity to run the pool vac for about 3 hours instead of 8-10. I dragged my feet buying this due to the expense, but it was totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Wallin

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for two months now. It does a great job. I am concerned with how long it will last but time will tell. I usually don’t buy the Asurion warranty plans but did so this time because of that concern. But again, it does a great job keeping the surface of the water completely clean. I usually just leave it in and let it run continually. It will run out of juice sometime in the middle of the night. I take it out every few days and clean the filter screen and wash off the unit and clean it with a rag. So far, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really love this auto pool surface skimmer and highly recommend it! I have had it for a couple of months now. Here's what I like: Solar powered Easy to clean Sturdy Reduces the need for me to shock my pool Makes the water crystal clear Virtually eliminates need for me to hand skim the pool Are there any negatives? Need to keep the pool water level a little lower than usual if you have a rim. Otherwise the skimmer gets stuck. If you use an auto pool sweeper, the skimmer may have difficulty going over the pool hose. I remedied that by purchasing pool hose weights. These keep the hose just below the water. Best investment!
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product - definately recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this about 1 year ago & it's been chugging along ever since. It makes dealing with the Arizona monsoon, winds & garbage from neighbors trees a lot easier. It really picks up all the stuff that floats on the top of the water and helps keep the skimmer & filter cleaner. Have had a couple of issues, but the customer service (located in Tempe, AZ) has been terrific and always take care of the issues. Have recommended to several people, including our pool service guy.
customer_reviews.author: John & Linda N

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for about 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Pool guy comes every Friday and within the first week him and I could both see a major difference. So easy too. Just turn it on and let it go. Enjoy every day or two. Should’ve bought this along time ago. **update** This machine worked great for about 6 months. Now the wheels up front won’t turn and it’s making a grinding noise. I would’ve expected a few years use for the big price.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Hall

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting
customer_reviews.text: During the spring and summer months I didn't have to use the leaf skimmer net once. I just had to empty the Solar Breeze every 1 to 3 days. Fall is a different story due to the amount of leaves. I've had to empty it a couple of times a day and use the leaf skimmer. If you have 2 to 3 days of full cloud coverage and/or rain the battery may not charge enough for the unit to run. Be sure to register with the Solar Breeze website. They are very good at helping should you have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great at first but less that 3 months after purchased, it started to fall apart. The vendor only guarantees it for three months if you have to get it repaired you have to call the manufacturer directly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was having a problem with fine debris floating on the surface of the pool that was taking a lot of skimming with a net. I unpacked the NX2, placed it in the pool, flicked the switch to on, it gently paddled away, & within about 30 minutes, the pool surface was completely clear. I'm only a couple of days in, but it's so nice to come home from work to a clean pool. I do not regret spending the $600 one bit!
customer_reviews.author: A M Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Customer service at Solar Breeze ROCKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the solar breeze Nx2 last summer and had a minor gear problem that needed repair. I got stellar response from the company. Within a day, they had sent me the needed parts and great instructions about how to install them. I guess someone else did not have the experience I had, but it looks as if they have cleaned it up. I love the solar breeze, it keeps the top of my pool pristine and it's fun to see how it moves around the pool figuring out how to get unstuck from the corners and other obstacles it finds. Great product, great service. You'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: TomR1950

customer_reviews.title: Worked less than two months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked outstanding for about 1 month and gradually stopped picking things up. I thought that maybe it had taken on water and was sitting too low, so I followed the manufactures directions to allow it to set on the end for several hours to drain. I have done this many times and it doesn't work. Less than two months and it has gone from functional to useless. Please read the reviews. $500 for one month is a huge waste. It still runs, mostly just pressed against a wall. When it does venture into the middle of the pool, it might pick up one or two leaves. Major rip off, spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Adam Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Great product, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, picks up everything in its path, runs non-stop (stores up enough charge daily to keep it going all night), BUT... when it hits the pool wall, the collection tray gets jarred loose just enough to create a half-inch gap in the back and then all the debris it’s collected falls out when it moves forward again. Totally counter-productive. I figured out a temp fix by gluing a thin 1/4 inch piece of plastic to the front of the channel to keep the tray locked in place and prevent it from moving forward. Shouldn’t need to do this. Would’ve given it 5 stars were it not for that design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Pressman

customer_reviews.title: Very good, solid performance
customer_reviews.text: I first bought an earlier model of this solar-powered pool skimming robot in 2016. After 4 years of hard use, it gave out and I bought this year's model to replace it. The new model is a modest improvement over the original. It moves faster and does a better job freeing itself when it gets stuck, as in a corner of my rectangular pool. An added feature is a sliding tray for chlorine pills--especially useful since my salt system has never been able to produce enough chlorine to keep my pool clean. I haven't given five stars only because I hope that further improvements will come in the future. In the meantime, this model is very much worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bloodhound

customer_reviews.title: Best pool invention in years!!
customer_reviews.text: The Solar Breeze has made owning a pool on a lot with a lot of mature trees painless!!! I had a couple of trees that dropped so many seeds in the pool we burned out a heater and almost a filter. Many times I contemplated cutting one beautiful old tree (couldn’t get myself to do it). Now it’s not even an issue that crosses my mind.
customer_reviews.author: David Rohtbart

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about 6 months. My pool is not screened and there are mature oak and pine trees in the surrounding yard. They drop tons of leaves and needles constantly but the solar breeze keeps the pool looking spotless. I have a nautilus dolphin pool cleaner that works flawlessly as well, but thanks to the solar breeze I only have to run it once per week at the most. It is easy to clean the filters and the sunlight charges it enough in the day that it runs continuously at night as well.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Pool Surface Cleaner Like No Other!
customer_reviews.text: My Solar Breeze NX2 robotic pool surface cleaner is the best addition to my pool maintenance tools to date. It's simple to use, easy to clean and wipes my pool surface of debris quickly and efficiently. The most exciting time to use the NX2 I've found is after the pool is first opened. Though the surface may be chock full of leaves and other nasty residue from the previous Fall and Winter seasons, the NX2 has no problem collecting the debris, again, in a quick and complete fashion. This summer has been the second season I've used the skimmer. I'm sure I will get many more seasons' use from the NX2. A great purchase indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Francis G.

customer_reviews.title: 100% failure
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these units including the ones I purchased for my Sons. Initially we were very happy they were doing a great job and easy to use. After about three months they all stopped working and all three were sent back for repair. It’s been two months and I just got one back today but not the other two. We’ll see if the repair works? I hope so because when it’s right it works great as far as the other two are concerned i’m Still waiting?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got hung up on ladder and on steps
customer_reviews.text: I have an in ground pool 16 x 32 with steps on one end and a ladder on the deep end. Cleaner got hung up on steps and on ladder constantly. Not just occasionally but within an hour it would be hung up. I had to to push it off the steps or away from the ladder. Less than an hour later same problem. I sent it back and do not recommend if you have steps or a ladder. I even tried to rig up barriers to keep it from hanging up but no luck. Great idea, just not engineered for my pool.
customer_reviews.author: bikertrashice

customer_reviews.title: Backpain Saver
customer_reviews.text: This solar powered skimmer is definitely a game changer. It picks up every little debris floating on top of the pool from the trees surrounding my pool. Definitely worth the money and saves you the back pain from netting everyday. You can also add two chlorine tablets to this machine. They have a pull out where you can add them. It also helps to keep the algae away and your pool sanitized.
customer_reviews.author: sara21

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Product not worth price. Plus leave compartment doesn’t securely hold trash upon removal from pool or while in operation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea LaFleur

customer_reviews.title: A life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This little skimmer does a fantastic job keeping our pool clean and clear and since it's solar powered I don't have to find a place to plug it in. I was worried it wouldn't have enough power to do a good job, but that hasn't been the case at all. I frequently call it a night before this little skimmer does. We have rails on our pool steps that the skimmer kept getting stuck in, but my husband strategically arranged a couple of cinder blocks on the steps for it to bounce off of and it hasn't been a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: LuvKeeshonden

customer_reviews.title: Hurray for a leaf free pool (finally!)- update , warranty policy is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for about 2 months and even our pool guy is impressed. We have a neighbor who has two trees that filled our pool with leaves everyday and this has kept our pool sparkling clean. Worth every penny. Update: after about 6 months the front paddle stopped working. I contacted solar breeze and found out that, although they will cover the repairs and parts, I have to pay for the shipping . On a item this expensive that’s simply poor customer service. When your item breaks under warranty don’t make the customer pay for the shipping. I reduced this from a 5 star to a 2 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: This Robot Is A Must
customer_reviews.text: We purchased it in September 2019 and it had been the energizer bunny, working non-stop, skimming the surface very effectively. We would clean the tray once a week, a bit more often if we had a lot of wind. At the beginning of this month the front wheels stopped turning, and it had become a brick. We emailed the customer service and they offered us either to swap it with a refurbished one, or send us tools to fix our original. We opted for the refurbished one, which looks brand new by the way, and it has been working as good as the original one. Cannot be happier with the product or the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ozbayrak

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I made last summer.
customer_reviews.text: This slimmer saved me hours and hours of vacuum pump time, which adds to $ in my pocket. If you catch what’s on top of the water, it never ends up on the bottom of the pool. It’s awesome! Runs on solar. Charges during the day and seems to almost constantly run. Easy to unload the slimmer basket and empty. I bought the protection on it, just because of the price point. Didn’t want to take a chance. I haven’t needed it yet. Hoping it’s still as good this coming summer.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: This a truley amazing product- I wish I had one a decade ago!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Look- I am your normal Joe, with a pool. I try to clean it myself, but the trees, bugs, dirt, wind, and all that beat me every day. I read about this product bought one and all I can say is, your nuts if you don't get one. This does an amazing job in cleaning up all the stuff on the top of the pool that in time ends up being on the bottom. So you have much less stuff to sweep and clean. Easy to run, turn on clean based on wind and garbage in the pool... Great product good good good!
customer_reviews.author: David L Stark

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt really work
customer_reviews.text: After using this for just over a month I have determined that it does not work as advertised. my pool is screened in but in the Florida weather we get a of gnats, and since they are smaller the screen I get a lot of dead gnats floating in my pool. this machine is a great concept but does not actually pickup all the floating stuff it should. on top of that as I have a vacuum connected it gets stuck and does not pass over the vacuum pipe and keeps getting stuck and going in circles.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Primer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would’ve bought it years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints so far. Have had it for 3 weeks now and it’s worked great. I’m guessing this skimmer has removed 15-20 lbs. of crap off the top of my pool. Leave it in all day and all night, the pool is clean in the morning when I get up and in the afternoon when the wife gets home from work. It’s been rained on - keeps on working.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C.

customer_reviews.title: SolarBreeze stopped working
customer_reviews.text: 2016 purchased this product and it stopped working within 2 years. Contact vendor and they offered an updated replacement with I received in 2018 and it is 2020 and it has stopped working. Cannot get anyone to answer phone or emails regarding possible repair solutions. I live in Massachusetts, I only use this product 4 months out of the year due to NE weather. So I've only gotten 8 months with the SolarBreeze. I will say it works well but for the price and the amount of time I was able to use it, it is not worth the money. Would be a great product if they could be it to work longer than 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great till it didn’t. And it only took 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 3 weeks. I was extremely pleased with it. Then, it started moving only in reverse, and even though it would still clean, it would constantly get stuck. The wheels on the back do not turn the way the front ones do, so it always gets stuck against a wall.
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: Solar-Breeze NX2 is Keeping My Pool CLEAN!
customer_reviews.text: I wish we'd bought this months... years ago! We have a Polaris which gets the debris off the floor of the pool, but because we have so many trees (pines, oaks etc), so much debris gets in the pool. We've had our Solar-Breeze NX2 aka Jaws, for a week now and the difference is amazing. Our only problem with it at this point is that it gets stuck up under the handrail. We're trying to figure a way for this not to happen. Other than that, it is a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: After a week of use, this robot works great. Does what it says it does. Very simple start up. We're in Florida, even with a screen enclosure around the pool, little gnats get thru and float on the pool surface. This robot cleans them up, so the bugs don't end up in your hair after swimming. :) :) :)
customer_reviews.author: vince z.

customer_reviews.title: Gets Stuck and Not Worth the Money !
customer_reviews.text: This product gets stuck near the pool Ladder every time I use it ! So, it doesn’t cover the surface area of the pool. I’m so disappointed and it was very expensive ! Also, it doesn’t hold much debris. And when lifted out of water, debris falls out of it and back into the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every "Penny"
customer_reviews.text: Oh why didn't I get this sooner. I'm in love❤. This is a must buy especially if u hate skimming the pool in hot summer days. And in the miserable fall when the leaves come down. unfortunately my pool is surrounded by many trees that drops their flowers and leaves. I was constantly slimmer no more. Solar Brezze to the rescue. Now I can sit back and relax with a margarita and a chase it down with a cold beer😎😊
customer_reviews.author: PKB2K6

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and then not so much
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for 2 weeks the. 4 and now 0!!️I was so excited it worked perfect for about a few weeks and then the front paddle wheel quit turning to pick up debris on the surface. You can hear the gears and motor running but the paddle wheel doesn’t turn. Having paid $600+ for something like this and have it quit working is frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sobczak

customer_reviews.title: The first one I bought lasted only a week and ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought lasted only a week and it broke down. Contacted the manufacturer. They were extremely and impressively helpful, and sent a new replacement one immediately. My concern is with the quality of the material used. The moving parts appear to be made of plastic. Hence, the useful/effective life of this machine is questionable to me. Using the replacement now for a week. Will see how it will perform.
customer_reviews.author: TED Z.

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been pretty good. We have an infinty edge pool at has a tight, less than 90 degree corner on one side. A couple of times one of the corner wheels has got caught over the infinity edge and the paddle wheels do not have the power to pull it back off. No big deal we just keep an eye on it and its easy to get that area on the pool deck and give ‘Top-Bottie’ a wee push. Even my Dolphin Electric Bottom Bot has trouble in that sharp corner. Both Bots are not run at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Curly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this unit for about 2 weeks. Its pretty cool as it navigates the pool. The only problem I have found it that it gets caught on the handrail at the steps. I have to put chairs on either side to keep it from being caught under the rail. other than this it works beautifully. Its easy to clean. I just put it in and come back in about 2 hrs and the water is cleared of leaves and bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C

customer_reviews.title: Beware of warranty and wheels
customer_reviews.text: When you have a problem with the product and purchase an extended warranty, there’s no way to contact the seller if it’s under manufacturer warranty. Beware! The wheels stopped working and this is our second replacement. The seller contacted me and hasn’t followed through. Such poor service once you purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: HorswillAZ

customer_reviews.title: No longevity and not as good as the first model
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ine after my last unit died. The first one lasted two years running 24/7. I bought this newer model on june 29. For the first 90 days the front wheels spun but did not function as intended. She would just face the wall and wheels spin but do not actually spin her away from the wall. Now they have completely stopped spinning. She spends most of her time stuck against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with our Solar Breeze.
customer_reviews.text: We've had our unit for about three months now and are very pleased. It does a great job skimming debris from the surface and is easy to clean. It seems the key to success is determining the best water level for the skimmer to work in your pool. We have flagstone coping above the tile and our Skinner works best if the front wheels hit the edge of the flagstone.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This little unit is better than expected! I'm impressed with how well it works! We have huge trees in our yard, and their dropping are constantly in our pool! My husband had to clean this out of our pool 3 times a day! Not anymore ... this thing works! The power works all day long. It takes the corners so well. It backs up on a scheduled timer, so it doesn't get tangled in the hose we have in the pool at all times. We had a pretty windy day here today, and it's still so clean! As long as this unit continues to work for a long time, I'll be thrilled! So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: pestibear

customer_reviews.title: It’s probably too expensive by $300 but its good.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works guys. I was super skeptical but it works. What I need it to do is get the fine particals and bugs out because carpenter ants and termites love my pool after a good rain and I cut down a nearby oak tree. So I got this to scoop’em up. So far so good. Hoping it doesn’t break as quickly as other people have said but I also don’t plan to run 24/7 either like I’m sure a lot of those guys did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cant live without it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. Had a problem a little after one month and called the manufacturer. Sent me a new (improved) version in 2 days and a return address label. Excellent customer service. Its pricey but it works so well. I was lost for 2 days waiting for the new one. Unbelievable how quickly i became dependent on this product ... Get one, you wont be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Denise D.

customer_reviews.title: Do you a beach entrance?
customer_reviews.text: It works well but don’t buy if you have a beach entrance to your pool or overhanging rocks close to the waterline. It gets stuck on the beach and can’t get off and tends to get stuck under overhanging rocks. But when it is not stuck it works well. It works best when you get in with it and direct it. It will clean your entire pool surface quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've been running the device for a month now, performing as promised. It's very good at keeping the water surface clear of debris, especially after the landscaping company comes by to cut the lawn which always results in getting grass clippings in the pool. My only concern is longevity since this device is expensive, but here time will tell. I have it running 24/7 whenever the kids are not in the pool. I hose down the filter and under part of the device weekly. I'll provide an update at the six month marker. But for now, I'll give this a thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Cm Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this machine thinking you'll never have to grab ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this machine thinking you'll never have to grab your skimmer net again. Product does work somewhat but with a huge pool surrounded by large oak trees I find I can skim more in 5 minutes with my net than this does in 5 hours!!!! Still a trippy little machine, just a little pricy for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Elwin Haddix

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last a season!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th solar skimmer - love the idea of it and it mostly works for the first few months - The first one lasted 2 years - the second lasted one season - the 3rd lasted for part of the season and this one didnt make it through the season - I really like it and when it works it does a great job! If you head into it with the idea that your paying this for a solar skimmer that lasts only one season you'll be fine - if you're expecting more than one season chances are you'll be very disappointed !! I
customer_reviews.author: chris F

customer_reviews.title: Dead in a year
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a champ until it didn't. I bought this almost a year ago and it no longer works. It started making a "clicking" noise a couple months ago and after that, stopped picking up leaves and now it just floats in the water like a dead white floaty piece of dead plastic...the lights still flash to remind me of how much money I waisted so that's fun
customer_reviews.author: Big Perch

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: The Solar Breeze is the best investment I have made in a while. I had constant issues with tree leaves, pollen etc. floating in the pool and finally decided to purchase a solar breeze. The product does an absolute phenomenal job keeping the pool surface clean and requires very little maintenance on my end. Not only that I am now able to decrease the pool pump cleaning time and run the pump at a lower speed. I am hoping to see my electric bill drop too! So all I can say is I love the Solar Breeze and we have named it Poomba!
customer_reviews.author: Love my Prime

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors behind me have a river birch, the ones beside me have lined the fence with crape myrtles, this equals a pool nightmare! This little robot seems to be almost life-changing. Last summer I skimmed easily 4-5 times a day & my pool always looked a mess, so far it has been pretty clean. the only negative I can see is that small particles get trapped under the unit but it is still soooooo much cleaner than ever before & worth every cent I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! I had the first one for about ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! I had the first one for about 5 weeks when the front propellor and wheels stopped spinning. Contacted Solar-Breeze directly and they sent me a new one. Not having it for the week while I was waiting on the new one just reminded me of how much I love this thing. Only negative thing I would have to say is that it gets stuck on the hoses for my bottom skimmer, but it usually gets itself free eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Kip Stovall

customer_reviews.title: This is a work horse.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for several months now. We love it. We used to have to skim the pool by hand if we wanted to swim -- but now we don't even think about it. The little guy just keeps working, day and night. We did have a problem within the first two weeks where the front motor burned out. The company was extremely good about replacing the product, acknowledging that they had a manufacturing run with a small incidence of defects but making things right promptly and without hassle. Since then, it's just work, work, work (for the machine, not me!)
customer_reviews.author: Fred in Livermore, CA

customer_reviews.title: Every pool owner should have at least one!!
customer_reviews.text: The best pool cleaner ever! I leave it in the pool year-round and I haven’t skimmed it manually since I bought it. I live in the middle of an orchard so it is working constantly. With the heavy debris I’ve had to order a few spare parts... customer service is fantastic!! 6 stars ⭐️ 👏👏👏
customer_reviews.author: Ls11🙋🦄🌴💜

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Saves Money
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our Solar-Breeze NX2 in April and it has been running everyday for the past 3 three months. It has kept the pool clean beyond our expiations. and almost totally eliminating hand skimming!! We have reduced running the filter pump to once a week. It is a Great product and looking forward to years of making our pool cleaning job easier. It also makes an interesting object to follow after the sun goes down.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend! No product is perfect, but strong service fills the gaps and keeps my pool clean.
customer_reviews.text: I just passed the 2 year mark of ownership on the unit I purchased in July 2018. We had some defective parts on the first unit and SB was quick to trade out our unit. The replacement unit then had some wear and tear due to large boulders around our pool. Again, contacted SB and customer service worked to repair unit quickly. Just this week needed to fix a small issue with the bot from the same boulders and coping, and not only was SB quick to help remedy, but also provided an accessory piece for pools with rough coping like mine to limit this taking place in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.  What a difference it makes in my pool, but it's dying
customer_reviews.text: Solar Breeze is an awesome product, keeps the pool really clean and picks up anything floating on the surface. However, this year (our 2nd), it is not picking up and not running properly. Trying to get in touch with the company but have not heard back from them. Very disappointed because it's a home pool game changer when it works.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Must admit, I was skeptical.. but this product works exactly as advertised. Our pool skimmers are currently non-functional due to some plumbing issues, so we purchased this to keep leaves off the surface of the pool (we live in the middle of a forest). Works great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vella

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slow shipping on Amazon’s part
customer_reviews.text: This product actually I would write at five stars works extremely well to keep the top of your pool clean. The only reason I gave it four stars is because Amazon is taking advantage of COVID-19 And not shipping like they normally would to save money on shipping but blaming it on COVID-19
customer_reviews.author: PickyMama

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I brilliantly bought it when it was $628 bucks so at least they dropped the price. Worked pretty good for about 90 days. Then something in the motor that spins the front wheels has gone out and it makes a terrible grinding noise. For this kind of $$$ the quality should be a lot higher.
customer_reviews.author: whodatt

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I have my over a year now no problem, and I have not ran my pump! I live in Tampa no cage and it works and keeps my pool looking good.
customer_reviews.author: frank fulghum

customer_reviews.title: Purchase! Great investment for your pool needs!
customer_reviews.text: Easy use, picks up pollen and mini items like ants and tree seeds. Moves fast for solar product. Took about an hour to charge in the sun Got stuck on my Polaris for a short moment but I’m very happy with the product. Definitely will recommend
customer_reviews.author: tami langhorne

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of how well the Solar Breeze would work and unsure if I wanted to spend that kind of money. I am so glad I did, it works great! During certain months we get tons of gnats on the pool surface (even with a screened pool). The skimmer didn't make a dent and it would take hours to clean the surface with a net, only to have the same problem the next day. The Solar Breeze takes care of that problem for me! It's solar and when charged, runs at night too, so I no longer have to spending hours on gnats. I highly recommend the Solar Breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without.
customer_reviews.text: Works so much better than I thought it would. It skimmed my pool in about an hour. I forget it is even there. Pool has that just cleaned look all of the time now. Recommend to anyone with a pool. Did get caught on the pool cleaner hose but just put some weights on the hose and now don't have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! AWESOME PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review before and I shop on Amazon all the time. This product REALLY WORKS. Very happy with my purchase. I have a large tree in my back yard near the pool and we have leaves and debris in the pool all the time. I currently use a creapy crawly for to sweep the bottom of the pool. The problem is I have only one skimmer output, therefore the creapy crawly uses that and the skimmer for the top of the pool can't work. This product solved the issue. No more debris on top of the water. Love it!!! Only one caveat...it does get caught in the creapy crawlee hose. Worth it though... Again VERY HAPPY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A truly amazing pool skimmer!
customer_reviews.text: The Solar Breeze NX2 is amazing! My pool has never looked so clean. I had a small problem with it getting caught up under the edge lip in a few spots so rather than increase/decrease the water level I came up with a simple solution, using a small rod which protrudes and some gorilla waterproof tape it no longer gets stuck - they should consider adding a piece for this in any future design. Check out the pics for more on my super hack :) Let’s hope this continues to perform after a few months of use. Overall, a must buy item for any pool!
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a skimmer. Wish it had a bigger basket but I have really heavy leaves. My first one broke after a few months. Just stopped working. However, Solar Breeze was great and sent me a replacement and I just returned the first. I guess they should better publish which resellers they support.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Howard

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews but I just got this thing and it is skimming during spring time. You can imagine all the pollen in the water. I have found it completely full each day and we had one bad day and had to empty it twice. great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: iT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: As simple to use as advertised and although I've only had it a couple of days, I am one happy camper. So simple even a caveman could use it. My only additional comment is I wish there was a larger collection basket as my pool gets a large amount of pine needles and I have to empty the basket frequently. Also occasionally does get hung up on my Polaris cable, But overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Saxton

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: If your pool is somewhere that gets a lot of leaves, bugs, etc in it, then this is an amazing product to have. I was skimming several times a day just to keep it somewhat clean. After getting the Solar-Breeze I never have to skim and the pool is sparkling clean all the time. The charge keeps it going until midnight or so. I do live in a very sunny area though (CA). The first unit they sent had a problem, so I emailed them and they had a replacement unit out to me the next day. They also sent a return shipping label for the original unit. Awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a be all end all solution, but it serves a purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for a week now, and while I still need to skim the pool manually, the time it takes is substantially shorter than what it used to be. Batman (my son named it) does get caught on the subsurface cleaner’s (Robin) hose frequently, but they tend to work it out (unless Robin is sleeping, then Batman tends to pester him until I go sort it out). Overall, it’s probably overpriced a bit, but there’s not a lot of other similar products on the market, so what are you going to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: More expensive than the original NX that lasted me 2 years, this one only lasted 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: Quality isn’t anything close to the original solar breeze NX. It’s now more expensive and cheaply made. I could see rust popping out of the corners? There must be a screw under the plastic. Front paddle and wheels stopped working in the first 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: kelly Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Su
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated buying this because of price but it is worth every penny. It keeps my pool super clean. I clean the filter every 2-3 days. Had to raise pool water level to avoid it getting stuck in a few areas. Overall, we love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GM Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Expensive with a short useful life.
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked for only a year. Two of the four corner wheels are driven, but one sounds like the gears are stripped so it turns only intermittently. Motor that advances the unit in the “cleaning” direction only turns slowly now. It used to turn fast when it cleaned, so now it doesn’t really clean at all anymore. My son is a mechanical engineer. He took it apart and found stripped plastic gears inside and a wiring harness with a bad connection. We don’t have pets or small children, so the cleaner should have had an easy life.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I can not stress how happy I am with this purchase. Yes it was high$$$$$$ but worth every penny. My pool has stayed sparkly clean even in the AZ monsoon storms. Everyone who sees it first compliments the pool then wants one for themselves. Hubby has admitted he was shocked at first with the cost but even more amazed on the job it does. No need for extra chemicals since debree doesn't have a chance to sink and decay. I can truly say I LOVE this solar machine!! Great invention. To my granddaughters surprise, she will be getting one as a house warming gift. Yes, everybody wants one!
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Gear design issues on front paddle.
customer_reviews.text: Thisnis a wonderful idea with limited market competition. I like the design, the fact that it holds 3 inc tab but the gear platform needs to be more robust and programing changes need to be made allowing the unit to reverse as soon as it feels more load than normal. I've been trying to get parts but noone has contacted me back. Customer service is .......well what customer service. A true shame. And shame on me for not doing more research in my excitement. Do your homework people.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever for pools
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of scooping up leaves daily and was getting tougher and tougher with all the trees we have in the backyard. Found this gem and it’s been awesome! Runs on solar and cleans all day and night. My pool has never been cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Carflo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped functioning after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We've had the product for just under 2 months. It was amazing best purchase we ever made but the front gears suddenly stopped working and aren't skimming anymore. Update-company totally sent new one and it works fantastically! Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.author: Khalid M. Miri

customer_reviews.title: Pool life changer!
customer_reviews.text: The solar breeze NX2 is a life changer when it comes to keeping the pool clean. It’s effortless and cleans the surface before allowing most small debris to fall to the bottom of the pool. I would highly recommend this to anyone. The solarbreeze customer service is amazing as well! This company gets an A+++!!!
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is non-existing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this through Amazon on May 28th, 2020. It was doing what it suppose to be doing until Sept 20th, 2020 which is less than 4 months it stopped getting charged and doesn't move at all. Multiple calls to the company with two emails has gone un-answered. It's too bad since it is a nice product. I do not recommend buying such things through Amazon since they can't help you either after 30-days.
customer_reviews.author: Issa K. Shokeh

product_meta.title: Solar Breeze – Automatic Pool Cleaner NX2 Cleaning Robot
product_meta.description: The Solar-Breeze NX2 is the 2018 model of our 3-in-one pool cleaner. Take your time back and let a robot keep your pool sparkling clean! Operating on free solar energy, the Solar-Breeze NX2 works almost around the clock to skim dirt and debris from the surface of your pool before it has a chance to sink and decay. The water passes through a fine mesh filter to remove bugs and dust and leave your pool sparkling clean. An on-board chlorine tray holds two 3-inch trichlor tablets (not included) allowing the Solar-Breeze NX 2 to clean your pool as it goes. - Cleans your pool with free energy from the sun. - Allows you to reduce your pool pump run time by up to two thirds. - Never hand-skim again. - Your pool is always Swim-Ready and Party-Ready. - No cords or hoses. - Just remove the unit from the pool and jump in!
feature_bullets: REMOVES 90-95% OF DEBRIS - Automatic Pool Cleaner removes 90-95% of surface debris while reducing the dust, leaves, pollen and bacteria with the automatic pool cleaner

LONG LASTING, SOLAR POWERED - Solar powered robotic pool cleaner uses the free energy of the sun, and last for several hours after sundown. Maximum running time per day mid-summer in sunbelt states 23.5 hours

AUTONOMOUS - Solar-Breeze NX knows how to navigate your pool, get out of sticky situations, all the while eating up debris, leaves, and dirt. It even filters your water to keep your pool fresh and clean!
INCREASED COLLECTION CAPACITY – Chemical dispenser tray accommodates two 3-inch trichlor tablets (not included), the collection area capacity is twice that of your in-wall skimmer basket.
SOLAR BREEZE CARES - If at any time you have questions or concerns regarding your product, please contact Solar Breeze through messaging services

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars559 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
